installCommand: amazon-linux-extras install -y docker && DOCKER_CONFIG=${DOCKER_CONFIG:-$HOME/.docker} && mkdir -p $DOCKER_CONFIG/cli-plugins && curl -SL https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/v2.17.2/docker-compose-linux-x86_64 -o $DOCKER_CONFIG/cli-plugins/docker-compose && chmod +x $DOCKER_CONFIG/cli-plugins/docker-compose && yarn add -W just-install && yarn
